title: The Hokey Pokey
short_plot_summary: The Hokey Pokey is a fun and interactive dance song where participants follow the lyrics and put different body parts in, out, and shake them all about.
explanation: A dancing figure, representing the dance aspect of the song
A pointing finger, indicating putting a body part in or out as described in the lyrics
Footprints, symbolizing the various body parts mentioned in the song, such as feet, legs, and arms
The counterclockwise arrows, illustrating the 'turning around' action in the dance
Party popper, representing the fun and festive nature of the song
